name: First Law
description:
“First Law” is a 2D side-scrolling platformer for the PC gaming market. The player rockets around the level at breakneck speed using the recoil from explosive blasts! Directional inputs are reversed; where the force of the player’s short-range attacks launches them in the opposite direction blasting them through the level on their stylish roller skates.

In a desperate attempt to escape imprisonment, the player must manage their momentum while avoiding obstacles in fast, exhilarating challenges
